hackathon-description-text: The School’s Out Hackathon (SoHacks) is a 24 hour coding event engineered to help students learn how to code. Students can make an app, website, or a piece of hardware with the help of experienced mentors, structured classes, and like-minded peers. This event is FREE, and food is provided.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Operations and Community Manager at Tech Bloc

hackathon-requirements: As long as it's built at the hackathon and is technological, you're good to go (hopefully uses code)!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The top 3 hacks will be awarded SoHacks memorabilia
The top 3 hacks will be awarded SoHacks memorabilia

The most innovative hack will be awarded a virtual reality head set.
The best CO ED team will be awarded Amazon Echo.

The best beginner hack will be awarded Microbit.
The best intermediate hack will be awarded raspberry pi kit.
The best educational hack will be awarded Bluetooth headphones.
$50 gift card for each member of the team
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: BEST WEBSITE CREATION FOR THE RUSSELL RUSH HAUNTED TOUR

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1 Trinity Pl, San Antonio, TX 78212, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Taking a creative approach to an issue is perhaps one of the key ideas behind a hackathon. Projects should exhibit some degree of creativity in their final product.
Projects should attempt to solve common problems in our society today. Solutions should be innovative and effective to earn full points in this category.

A well-designed product tends to do well in today’s marketplace, and so the hacks should show some element of good design in them. Whether it is flat or skeuomorphic, a design should be pleasing to the eye.
Advanced technology is all around us. At hackathons, products should use as many tools as possible to make sure that the product is the best it can be.

hackathon-location-address: 1 Trinity Pl, San Antonio, TX 78212, USA
hackathon-description-header: A free hackathon for high school students
